room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist 2" by Room Escape Williamsburg in Williamsburg
review: First experience ever with an escape room. Did the Bank Heist and were paired with another couple. Loved it so much we all decided to do another room together! Thanks for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist 2" by Room Escape Williamsburg in Williamsburg
review: We did the Bank Heist. We had a total of 7 people. We had a ball. We got all the way into the safe with approximately 2 minutes left and got the diamonds. However, we trip off the alarm. So we would have either had to shoot it out with the police or go to jail... We would have went to jail. Lol can't wait to do another
